!Weapons Trader Stanford: Welcome, young adventurer. Our shop specializes in weapons. In fact, most of Aden's most famous Knights carry weapons we sold them. Now then, why don't you choose one for yourself? I'm sure there are many here you will admire. Take your time and choose one whose very presence will make you feel more secure.
